title: Ariat Men's Fr Solid Vent Work Shirt
description: MEN’S WORK SHIRT: You can count on this vented western-style work shirt for men when working in hazardous working conditions. Designed in a button-down pattern with front chest pockets and flame-resistant material, it has style as well as function.

MOISTURE MANAGEMENT: This Ariat woven shirt made of a quality fabric and moisture movement technology to wick moisture away, is a must-have for hardworking men. The button-down shirt includes strategically placed vents ensures added comfort.

FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT: Giving you the freedom of movement every day, this men’s shirt with Greater Arm Mobility technology offers a maximum range of motion. It includes VenTEK technology to enable airflow and regulate body temperature.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES: This long-sleeved cotton work shirt features a buttoned collar, ribbed cuffs, honeycomb mesh side panels, and front chest zip pockets for practical use.

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions. Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability.
This is a place holder until spring 17 product copy is written
